project.description: Private job or testing guest instance networking

org.jvnet.jenkins.plugins.nodelabelparam.name: SiteLabel
org.jvnet.jenkins.plugins.nodelabelparam.description:
One of "cambourne", "cambridge", "santa-clara", or "redmond".
Make sure that this matches the PrivateBuildURL parameter above! If you get this wrong, then you will end up streaming VM images from one site to another, and the build will time out.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MasterServer
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This will completely wipe the specified machine! Leave blank to use the default test machine on the specified site. Use ssh-upload-jenkins-keys from root@openstack-jenkins.uk.xensource.com to allow remote login.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Password
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: XenAPI root's password, which will be used for verifying the correct configuration of XenServer networks assigned to instances and the nova network node.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NetworkingMode
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Network manager to employ. Adding the "-ha" suffix to the manager specifies HA networking configuration.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GuestNetworkBridge
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The host bridge to be used for instance networking.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SpawnTimeout
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Maximum time in seconds that the test runner should wait for instances to spawn

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BootTimeout
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Maximum time in seconds that the tests runner should wait for instance to be fully booted after being spawn (For test purposes this is the time required for allowing the sshd service on the instance to start)
